main.bio: I am passionate about technology, open to new development trends. I always give my best in my work to feel happy with myself and enjoy the usefulness that my development generates together with the work team. I am interested in JavaScript and related technologies that improve its use. I currently work with NodeJS for the Telecommunications sector, with functions such as automation of remote configurations and management of telecommunications equipment, REST integrations and data extraction.

education.description: Describe your experience at school, what you learned, what useful skills you have acquired etc.

resume.skillmessage: I currently work with NodeJS for the Telecommunications sector, in addition to sometimes using integrations with Python through API's. Iâ€™m interested in JavaScript and related technologies that improve its use.

education.description: Here I graduated from a Telecommunications Engineering degree and achieved a much more complete training in the theory and concepts behind networks and their virtualization. It was here that I learned the great importance of programming for networks as a scalability and monitoring solution, since it helps us reduce the efforts that are normally made in a common network by centralizing control. Thanks to this I discovered my passion for programming and development, for the security behind computer systems, and I discovered that I have a special ability to understand complex algorithms.

work.title: Full Stack Developer
work.description: Full Stack Developer in the Telecommunications Sector. With functions such as automation of remote configurations and management of telecom equipment, REST integrations and data extraction.
work.extra1: Responsible for developing and deploying web services in JavaScript (Node.JS) using database models.
work.extra2: Responsible for designing the Fronted to facilitate the visualization of the resources and scope of the client's internal network.
work.extra3: Responsible for of monitoring the server where the activities are carried out and where the data is stored.

work.title: Network Analyst Assistant
work.description: Network Analyst Assistant. Where we provided 24/7 technical support to our corporate clients.
work.extra1: Responsible for the installation and configuration of the Internet service and security requested by the client
work.extra2: Responsible for the enhancement of telecommunications equipment of various brands and models that returned to the company after completing their cycle within the customer's circuit.
work.extra3: Incident area assistant, where we provide 24/7 technical support to solve problems for our clients immediately.

work.title: Pre-professional Intern in Networks and Computer Security
work.description: Pre-professional Intern in Networks and Computer Security. Configurations and quality support in the company's internal network.
work.extra1: Assistant in the area of configuration, support and deployment of internal customer networks.
work.extra2: Technical support in the area of logistics and supply of telecommunications products for the company.
work.extra3: Assistant in the pre-sales area, promoting telework and tele-education technologies to potential clients.

projects.category: Dashboard to manage the resources and equipment of the telecommunications network deployed by Entel.
